rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0002
rows.name: So there you are, Meleph-san.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0003
rows.name: ...Is something wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0004
rows.name:
No, not at all.
I've just been thinking.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0005
rows.name: ...Any particular worries?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, it's just...
My younger brother.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0007
rows.name: Emperor Nefer? Is he okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0008
rows.name: I'm...concerned he'll wear himself out.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0009
rows.name: The Emperor is quite young, isn't he...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes. The weight of responsibility
is a heavy burden for someone his age...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0013
rows.name: Have you two spoken recently?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, as Special Inquisitor, I send him
reports almost daily...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0015
rows.name:
No, I mean, just...
talk, like siblings do.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0016
rows.name: Chat about family stuff, things like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0017
rows.name: Talk like siblings do...?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0018
rows.name:
It may shock you, but neither me nor
the Emperor are great at small talk.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0019
rows.name: Don't overthink it.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0020
rows.name:
You can talk about anything,
so long as it's not work.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0021
rows.name: You should just go drop in.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0022
rows.name: Ah, the Emperor is a very busy person...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0023
rows.name:
Engaging in idle chit-chat with me...
That would be a waste of his time.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0024
rows.name: How do I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0025
rows.name: Surely he'd be happy to see his big sis.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0026
rows.name: Sounds like you don't want to see him...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0101
rows.name:
Surely even the great Emperor Nefer
would be happy to see his big sis!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0102
rows.name: ...Thank you, Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0103
rows.name:
Alas, my brother and I are
hardly your average family.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0104
rows.name:
His Imperial Majesty and his retainer,
the Special Inquisitor...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0105
rows.name:
Our stations differ greatly,
as do our ways of life.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0106
rows.name:
We couldn't possibly expect to talk
like normal siblings...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0107
rows.name:
Oh, give me a break!
You think your "stations" trump your
relationship as brother and sister?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0108
rows.name: Hikari?! When did you-

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0109
rows.name: I couldn't listen to you anymore.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0110
rows.name:
You're family, aren't you?
You and Emperor Nefer.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0111
rows.name:
Emperor or not, he's your brother,
first and foremost.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0112
rows.name: What more is there to think about?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0113
rows.name:
...Even so...
It has been a long time since we've
acted as siblings...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0114
rows.name:
Look at me and Homura. We haven't
exactly been in touch all that much.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0115
rows.name: And now? We're rock-solid.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0116
rows.name: That's not exactly...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0117
rows.name: Shut it!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0118
rows.name:
You being worried about your brother
makes you family enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0119
rows.name: Your stations don't come into it!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0120
rows.name:
Just woman up and be
a good sister already!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0121
rows.name: M-mhm...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0122
rows.name: Maybe you're right...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0123
rows.name: Of course I'm right. Obviously.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0124
rows.name:
Just enjoy some time with your little
bro and spoil him rotten. That's it.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0125
rows.name:
...Very well. Then I will strive to be
the sister Nefer deserves.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0126
rows.name:
You better be ready the next time you
two meet.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0127
rows.name:
I will...
I promise.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0128
rows.name: Finally, we've made some progress.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0129
rows.name:
You and Rex both get so stuck in your
heads, it's infuriating.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0130
rows.name:
Ha...
Thanks for the pep talk, Hikari.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0131
rows.name: You're very welcome.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0201
rows.name:
Hang on. Meleph, could it be that
you don't want to see him?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0202
rows.name: No, that's not it.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0203
rows.name:
I would like to spend time with him,
no question.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0204
rows.name:
But I'm afraid our respective stations
would get in the way...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0205
rows.name:
Stations...?
You mean because he's Emperor?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0206
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0207
rows.name:
When my little brother took the throne,
I volunteered to become his shield.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0208
rows.name:
It was then that we cut the
familial bonds between us.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0209
rows.name: You poor thing...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0210
rows.name:
Please don't misunderstand.
I do not regret choosing this life.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0211
rows.name:
To protect my brother, and all of
Superbia... There is no higher joy
for me.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0213
rows.name:
...As a Blade, I have no family.
But I do long for the kind of relations
that a family brings.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0214
rows.name:
You and Emperor Nefer are already
connected, and more closely than
you might think.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0215
rows.name:
But still, you don't go to
see him...? Why?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0216
rows.name:
Surely there wouldn't be any harm
in just talking and enjoying each
other's company?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0217
rows.name:
In all honesty...there's
nothing I'd want more.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0219
rows.name:
I think Emperor Nefer would enjoy
a chance to talk with you, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0220
rows.name: I mean, isn't that what family's about?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0221
rows.name:
I don't think bonds can be cut
as easily as that, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0222
rows.name: I...that is...

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0223
rows.name: Just try. Go see him.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0224
rows.name:
Emperor, retainer...
That isn't what counts.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0225
rows.name:
You don't need some special reason
to go talk to your brother, Meleph!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0226
rows.name: And I bet he'd appreciate it, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0227
rows.name:
Hah. Indeed.
It may well be as you say.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0228
rows.name:
It's possible that I was the one who
built a wall between us.

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0229
rows.name:
You know where to start, right?
Tear down that wall!

rows.label: kizunatalk025_msg0230
rows.name:
Yes. I'll do my best.
Thank you, Homura.
